alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 10 at 7:25AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Gulf, southeastern Bay and southwestern Liberty Counties through 815 AM EST/715 AM CST/... At 724 AM EST/624 AM CST/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles south of Tyndall Air Force Base, or 18 miles west of Port St. Joe, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mexico Beach, Stonemill Creek, Tyndall Air Force Base, Wewahitchka, Honeyville, Allanton, Chipola Cutoff, Overstreet, Davis Beach, Willis Landing, Wetappo, Beacon Hill, Dalkeith and Saint Joe Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
